backup.title: Database Backup & Restore
backup.description: Create complete database backups and restore from previous backups.

create.title: Create Backup
create.description: Create a complete backup of your database including WAL and SHM files. Choose your backup location.

restore.title: Restore Backup
restore.description: Restore your database from a previous backup file. This will replace all current data. Then restart the application to apply changes.

importantNotes.title: Important Notes:
importantNotes.note1: Backup includes WAL and SHM files for complete data integrity
importantNotes.note2: Restore will replace ALL current data with backup data
importantNotes.note3: A pre-restore backup is automatically created before restoration
importantNotes.note4: You will be prompted to restart the application after restoration
